import React from 'react'; import { Formik } from 'formik'; import * as Yup from 'yup'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import '../../css/Signup.css'; export const Register = () => { const validate = Yup.object({ firstName: Yup.string() .min(3, 'Must be 15 characters or less') .max(15, 'Must be 15 characters or less') .required('Required'), lastName: Yup.string() .max(20, 'Must be 20 characters or less') .required('Required'), email: Yup.string() .email('Email is invalid') .required('Email is required'), password: Yup.string() .min(6, 'Password must be at least 6 charaters') .required('Password is required'), confirmPassword: Yup.string() .oneOf([Yup.ref('password'), null], 'Password must match') .required('Confirm password is required') }); return ( { console.log(values); }} > ); }; function Signup() { return (
